relics.description: While the top card of your draw pile is an Attack, gain 2 Strength. While the top card of your draw pile is a Skill, gain 2 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: The diaphanous weave would be almost see-through... if you had sight.

relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, gain 1 Strength.

relics.flavorText: The runes inscribed here curse you without even being read.

relics.flavorText: The pure water contained in this basin leaves you feeling cleansed, inside and out.

relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 21.
relics.flavorText: The fruit of the ancient gods and goddesses, fresh and juicy.

relics.name: Stone Tablet
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: The tally marks scratched into the surface indicate this tablet was used for some sort of accounting.

keywords.name: Augury
keywords.description:
This number of cards from the top of your draw pile are revealed, maximum of 7.
Lose 1 Augury at the start of each turn.

keywords.name: Entropy
keywords.description: When played, ALL cards with Entropy will deal 1 additional damage or gain 1 additional Block for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Fated
keywords.description: Gain the additional effect if this is the first Fated card you play in a turn.

keywords.name: Revealed
keywords.description: Cards from the top of your draw pile that are displayed by Augury.

keywords.name: Vanishing
keywords.description: Exhausts when played and the value is reduced by 1. When this reaches 0, remove it from your deck completely.

mods.name: The Ephemeral
mods.description:
A blind oracle betrayed by a cult long ago. A specter that now haunts the Spire, seeking vengeance.
